document_data.name: Rune Chant
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Rune chant''''' was a [[divine]] [[abjuration]]/[[evocation]] [[spell]] that was granted to select [[dwarven]] paragons by the [[Morndinsamman]]. In times of great need, it would be granted to clan leaders, legendary heroes, or the [[High Old One]]s of [[Dumathoin]].

When cast, this spell created a certain ''[[rune of power]]'' to appear anywhere within a certain distance from the caster. There were numerous [[dwarvish]] words that could be used to manifest one of these runes, with a variety of different effects.
